com.caseybrooks.androidbibletools.basic

Class BibleList<T extends Bible>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.caseybrooks.androidbibletools.basic.BibleList<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of Bible contained in this list
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ABSBibleList, CJBBibleList

    public abstract class BibleList<T extends Bible>
extends java.lang.Object
    A base class for a collection of Bibles, typically offered by an online Bible text provider. A BibleList allows a user to choose their desired Bible version to download verses from. Providers looking to add their own web services should extend this class to implement the necessary functionality. A BibleList class can be used by a BiblePicker to expose the list of Bibles to users to be set as a preference.
    See Also:
    Bible, BiblePicker

      • getBibles

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,T> getBibles()
        Get a HashMap containing the available Bibles, with their primary ID as a map key.
        Returns:
        map of available Bibles

      • setBibles

        public void setBibles(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,T> bibles)
        Manually set the list of Bibles. Useful if you need to create the BibleList from another class, but still want to use it with this class for its compatibility with BiblePicker
        Parameters:
        bibles - the map of keys to Bibles to set
